lessons.title: Day 71: Spinal Decompression
lessons.description: Focus on exercises that decompress and lengthen your spine for maximum height potential.

steps.title: Spinal Health
steps.text:
Your spine is the foundation of your height. Decompression exercises help reverse the effects of gravity and daily compression.

Benefits:
• Increases disc space
• Improves posture
• Reduces back pain
• Enhances flexibility
• Promotes growth

Practice these exercises daily for best results.

steps.title: Hanging Exercise
steps.description: Hang from a pull-up bar or sturdy surface. Let your body stretch naturally, feeling the spine decompress.

steps.title: Cobra Stretch
steps.description: Lie on stomach, hands under shoulders. Lift chest up while keeping hips on ground. Arch back gently.

steps.title: Posture Check
steps.prompt: Stand tall and decompress your spine!
steps.description: Mid-afternoon reminder to maintain good posture and spinal alignment.

lessons.title: Day 72: Vitamin D & Calcium
lessons.description: Learn about the crucial role of vitamin D and calcium in bone health and growth.

steps.title: Bone Building Nutrients
steps.text:
Vitamin D and calcium work together to build strong bones. Vitamin D helps your body absorb calcium effectively.

Best sources:
• Vitamin D: Sunlight, fatty fish, eggs
• Calcium: Dairy, leafy greens, fortified foods
• Get 15-20 minutes of sun daily
• Consider supplements if needed

Strong bones support your height potential.

steps.title: Wall Angels
steps.description: Stand with back against wall, feet shoulder-width apart. Slide arms up and down wall in snow angel motion.

steps.title: Superman Hold
steps.description: Lie on stomach, lift arms and legs off ground simultaneously. Hold and engage back muscles.

lessons.title: Day 73: Hip Flexibility
lessons.description: Improve hip flexibility to enhance posture and reduce lower back strain.

steps.title: Hip Health
steps.text:
Tight hips can cause poor posture and back pain. Flexible hips improve your overall alignment and movement quality.

Benefits:
• Better posture
• Reduced back pain
• Improved walking gait
• Enhanced athletic performance
• Better balance

Focus on gentle, consistent stretching.

steps.title: Lunges
steps.description: Step forward into a lunge, back knee nearly touching ground. Hold and feel the hip stretch, then switch sides.

steps.title: Hip Circles
steps.description: Stand with hands on hips, make large circles with your hips. Go clockwise then counterclockwise.

steps.title: Hip Check
steps.prompt: Take a moment to stretch your hips!
steps.description: Midday reminder to keep your hips flexible and mobile.

lessons.title: Day 74: Breathing & Growth
lessons.description: Learn how proper breathing techniques support growth and overall health.

steps.title: Breath for Growth
steps.text:
Proper breathing delivers oxygen to your cells and supports growth hormone production. Deep breathing also reduces stress.

Benefits:
• Better oxygen delivery
• Reduced stress hormones
• Improved focus
• Enhanced recovery
• Better sleep quality

Practice deep breathing throughout the day.

steps.title: Deep Breathing
steps.description: Sit comfortably, inhale deeply for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 6. Focus on expanding your ribcage.

steps.title: Cat-Cow Breathing
steps.description: On hands and knees, arch back on inhale, round back on exhale. Coordinate movement with breath.

steps.title: Breathing Check
steps.prompt: How long should you exhale in deep breathing?

lessons.title: Day 75: Strength Training
lessons.description: Build strength to support your posture and overall height optimization goals.

steps.title: Strength for Height
steps.text:
Strength training builds muscle that supports your skeleton and improves posture. Strong muscles help maintain proper alignment.

Focus areas:
• Back muscles
• Core strength
• Leg muscles
• Shoulder stability
• Glute strength

Start with bodyweight exercises and progress gradually.

steps.title: Push-ups
steps.description: Start in plank position, lower body to ground, push back up. Keep body in straight line throughout.

steps.title: Squats
steps.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower into squat position, thighs parallel to ground, then stand up.

steps.title: Strength Time
steps.description: Evening reminder for your strength training session.

lessons.title: Day 76: Recovery & Mobility
lessons.description: Focus on recovery techniques and mobility work to support your growth journey.

steps.title: Recovery Matters
steps.text:
Recovery is when your body grows and adapts. Proper recovery techniques enhance your results and prevent injury.

Recovery methods:
• Stretching
• Foam rolling
• Rest days
• Proper nutrition
• Quality sleep
• Hydration

Listen to your body and prioritize recovery.

steps.title: Foam Rolling
steps.description: Use a foam roller to massage your legs, back, and shoulders. Focus on tight areas and breathe deeply.

steps.title: Mobility Flow
steps.description: Gentle flowing movements through your full range of motion. Focus on smooth, controlled movements.

steps.title: Recovery Time
steps.prompt: Take time to recover and recharge!
steps.description: Evening reminder to focus on recovery and relaxation.

lessons.title: Day 77: Week 11 Review
lessons.description: Check your progress and celebrate completing eleven weeks of height optimization.

steps.title: Full Body Stretch
steps.description: Complete stretching routine covering all major muscle groups. Move slowly and breathe deeply throughout.

steps.title: Eleven Weeks Strong!
steps.text:
Congratulations on completing eleven weeks of height optimization! You've built a comprehensive routine.

Your achievements:
• Consistent daily practice
• Improved strength and flexibility
• Better nutrition habits
• Enhanced recovery practices
• Stronger foundation

You're building lasting habits for your height journey!
